entries.name: Ability Score Enhancement
entries: Choose one score to increase by 2, or two scores to increase by 1: Strength, Dexterity, Wisdom.

entries.name: Age
entries: Bestari typically live up to 30 years and are considered Mature at age 5.

entries.name: Size
entries: Medium (4 - 7 feet tall).

entries.name: Claws
entries: Your sharp claws are natural weapons, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. If you hit with them, you deal slashing damage equal to 1d6 + your Strength or Dexterity modifier, instead of the normal unarmed strike damage.

entries.name: Primal Agility
entries: Before you move, as a {@variantrule Bonus Action|Ishiir} you can double your speed until the end of the turn. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you move 0 feet on one of your turns.

entries.name: Longstrider's Stamina
entries: When you take the {@action Dash|Ishiir} action or use your Primal Agility trait, difficult terrain doesn't cost you extra movement until the end of your turn.

entries.name: Pack Hunter
entries: When an ally who is not {@condition Incapacitated|Ishiir} is within 5 feet of your attack target, you can gain {@variantrule Advantage|Ishiir} on attack rolls gainst that creature until the end of turn. You may do so a number of times equal to your {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir} bonus. You regain one expended use upon completing a {@variantrule Short Rest|Ishiir}, and all expended uses upon completing a {@variantrule Long Rest|Ishiir}.

entries.name: Predator's Prowess
entries: Select either the {@skill Athletics} or {@skill Stealth} skill. You have {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir} in the chosen skill. If you later gain {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir} in that skill from one of your class or background features, you instead gain Expertise.

entries.name: Languages
entries: Common and one language of your choice.

entries.name: Ability Score Enhancement
entries: Choose one score to increase by 2, or two scores to increase by 1: Strength, Constitution, Charisma.

entries.name: Age
entries: Dragonborn typically live for up to 200 years.

entries.name: Size
entries: Medium (5-7 feet tall).

entries.name: Draconic Ancestry
entries: Choose the colour of your Dragonborn. Your choice affects your Breath Weapon trait and you have {@variantrule Resistance|Ishiir} to the damage type determined by your Draconic Ancestry trait.

entries.name: Breath Weapon
entries: When you take the {@action Attack|Ishiir} action on your turn, you can replace one of your attacks with an exhalation of magical energy in either a 15-foot Cone or a 30-foot Line that is 5 feet wide.

Each creature in that area must make a Dexterity {@variantrule Saving Throw|Ishiir} (DC 8 plus your chosen modifier and {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir} Bonus). On a failed save, a creature takes 1d10 damage of the type determined by your Draconic Ancestry trait. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage. This damage increases by 1d10 when you reach character levels 5 (2d10), 11 (3d10), and 17 (4d10).

You can use this Breath Weapon a number of times equal to your {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir} Bonus, and you regain one expended use when you finish a {@variantrule Short Rest|Ishiir} and all expended uses when you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|Ishiir}. Intelligence, Wisdom or Charisma is your ability modifier for your breath weapon, chosen when selecting this species.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of grey.

entries.name: Draconic Flight
entries: When you reach character level 5, you can channel draconic magic to give yourself temporary flight. As a {@variantrule Bonus Action|Ishiir}, you sprout spectral wings on your back that last for 10 minutes or until you retract the wings (no action required) or have the {@condition Incapacitated|Ishiir} condition. During that time, you have a {@variantrule Fly Speed|Ishiir} equal to your {@variantrule Speed|Ishiir}. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|Ishiir}.

entries.name: Languages
entries: Common, Draconic and one language of your choice.

entries.name: Ability Score Enhancement
entries: Choose one score to increase by 2, or two scores to increase by 1: Strength, Constitution, Wisdom.

entries.name: Age
entries: Dwarves typically live for up to 400 years.

entries.name: Size
entries: Medium (4-5 feet tall).

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of grey.

entries.name: Dwarven Resilience
entries: You have {@variantrule Resistance|Ishiir} to Poison damage. You also have {@variantrule Advantage|Ishiir} on {@variantrule Saving Throw|Ishiir|Saving Throws} you make to avoid or end the {@condition Poisoned|Ishiir} condition.

entries.name: Dwarven Toughness
entries: Your Hit Point maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 again whenever you gain a level.

entries.name: Tool Expertise
entries: Select one artisan's tool. You gain {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir} in the selected tool. If you later gain {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir} in that tool from one of your class or background features, you instead gain Expertise.

entries.name: Dwarven Combat Training
entries: You gain {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir} with 2 simple or martial weapons of your choice. In addition you also gain Light and Medium Armour {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir}.

entries.name: Languages
entries: Common, Dwarvish and one language of your choice.

entries.name: Ability Score Enhancement
entries: Choose one score to increase by 2, or two scores to increase by 1: Constitution, Intelligence, Wisdom.

entries.name: Age
entries: Gnomes typically live up to 50 years.

entries.name: Size
entries: Small (3-4 feet tall).

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of grey.

entries.name: Gnome Cunning
entries: You have {@variantrule Advantage|Ishiir} on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma {@variantrule Saving Throw|Ishiir|Saving Throws} against spells.

entries.name: Languages
entries: Common, Gnomish and one language of your choice.

entries.name: Ability Score Enhancement
entries: Choose one score to increase by 2, or two scores to increase by 1: Dexterity, Intelligence, Charisma.

entries.name: Age
entries: Halfling typically live up to 150 years.

entries.name: Size
entries: Small (2-3 feet tall).

entries.name: Brave
entries: You have {@variantrule Advantage|Ishiir} on {@variantrule Saving Throw|Ishiir|Saving Throws} you make to avoid or end the {@condition Frightened|Ishiir} condition.

entries.name: Friendly Demeanor
entries: You gain {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir} in the {@skill Persuasion} skill.

entries.name: Halfling Nimbleness
entries: You can move through the space of any creature that is a size larger than you, but you can't stop in the same space.

entries.name: Luck
entries: When you roll a 1 on the d20 of a {@variantrule D20 Test|Ishiir}, you can reroll the die, and you must use the new roll.

entries.name: Naturally Stealthy
entries: You can take the {@action Hide|Ishiir} action even when you are obscured only by a creature that is at least one size larger than you.

entries.name: Languages
entries: Common, Gnomish and one language of your choice.

entries.name: Ability Score Enhancement
entries: Choose one score to increase by 2, or two scores to increase by 1: Dexterity, Intelligence, Wisdom.

entries.name: Age
entries: A High elf is considered mature at age 100 and Will Typically live for up to 1,000 years.

entries.name: Size
entries: Medium (6-8 feet tall).

entries.name: Arcane Ancestry
entries: You have {@variantrule Advantage|Ishiir} on {@variantrule Saving Throw|Ishiir|Saving Throws} you make to maintain concentration on a spell.

entries.name: The First Wanderers
entries: You gain {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir} in {@skill History} or {@skill Religion}. You may use your Intelligence or Wisdom modifier for the selected skill and have {@variantrule Advantage|Ishiir} when making a {@skill History} or {@skill Religion} skill check related to the Pantheon of Eighteen.

entries.name: Languages
entries: Common and Elvish and one language of your choice.

entries.name: Ability Score Enhancement
entries: Add 1 to any single ability score of your choice.

entries.name: Age
entries: Humans typically live up to 80 years and are considered Mature at age 18.

entries.name: Size
entries: Small (3-5 feet tall), or Medium (5 - 7 feet tall), chosen when you select this species.

entries.name: Resourceful
entries: You gain {@variantrule Heroic Inspiration|Ishiir} whenever you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|Ishiir}.

entries.name: Skillful
entries: You gain {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir} in two skills of your choice.

entries.name: Versatile
entries: You gain a feat of your choice that you meet the prerequisites for.

entries.name: Languages
entries: Common and two languages of your choice.

entries.name: Ability Score Enhancement
entries: Choose one score to increase by 2, or two scores to increase by 1: Strength, Dexterity, Constitution.

entries.name: Age
entries: Orcs typically live up to 50 years.

entries.name: Size
entries: Medium (6 - 7 feet tall).

entries.name: Adrenaline Rush
entries: You can take the {@action Dash|Ishiir} action as a {@variantrule Bonus Action|Ishiir}. When you do so, you gain a number of Temporary Hit Points equal to your {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir} Bonus.

You can use this trait a number of times equal to your {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir} Bonus, and you regain one expended use when you finish a {@variantrule Short Rest|Ishiir} and all expended uses when you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|Ishiir}.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of grey.

entries.name: Relentless Endurance
entries: When you are reduced to 0 Hit Points but not killed outright, you can drop to 1 Hit Point instead. Once you use this trait, you can't do so again until you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|Ishiir}.

entries.name: Master Combatant
entries: You gain {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir} in 2 melee weapons and 1 ranged weapon of your choice.

entries.name: Languages
entries: Common, Orc and one language of your choice.

entries.name: Ability Score Enhancement
entries: Choose one score to increase by 2, or two scores to increase by 1: Constitution, Intelligence, Charisma.

entries.name: Age
entries: Tieflings typically live up to 100 years.

entries.name: Size
entries: Medium (5 - 7 feet tall).

entries.name: Tyrant's Legacy
entries: You are the recipient of a legacy that grants you supernatural abilities. Choose a legacy from the Tyrannical Legacies table. You gain the level 1 benefit of the chosen legacy.

When you reach character levels 3 and 5, you learn a higher-level spell, as shown on the table. You always have that spell prepared. You can cast it once without a spell slot, and you regain the ability to cast it in that way when you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|Ishiir}. You can also cast the spell using any spell slots you have of the appropriate level.
Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for the spells you cast with this trait (choose the ability when you select the legacy).

entries.name: Cursed Bloodline
entries: You have {@variantrule Advantage|Ishiir} on {@variantrule Saving Throw|Ishiir|Saving Throws} against being {@condition Frightened|Ishiir} and you gain {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir} in the {@skill Intimidation} skill.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You have Darkvision with a range of 60 feet.

entries.name: Child of Embers
entries: You have {@variantrule Resistance|Ishiir} to fire damage.

entries.name: Languages
entries: Common, Infernal and one language of your choice.

entries.caption: Tyrannical Legacies
rows: You know the {@spell Fire Bolt|Ishiir} cantrip.
You know the {@spell Green-Flame Blade|Ishiir} cantrip.

entries.name: Ability Score Enhancement
entries: Choose one score to increase by 2, or two scores to increase by 1: Dexterity, Wisdom, Charisma.

entries.name: Age
entries: Wood Elves typically live up to 750 years, they are considered mature at age 50.

entries.name: Size
entries: Medium (6-7 feet tall).

entries.name: Bowmastery
entries: You have {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir} with the Longbow and Shortbow. In addition, your ranged weapon attacks made using a Shortbow or Longbow ignore half cover.

entries.name: Forest Stride
entries: You have {@variantrule Advantage|Ishiir} on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks when in natural environments.

entries.name: Hunter's Reflex
entries: When a creature within 5 feet of you makes an attack against you and misses, you may move 5 feet without provoking {@action Opportunity Attack|Ishiir|Opportunity Attacks}.

entries.name: Superior Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 120 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of grey.

entries.name: Wild Grace
entries: You can climb difficult natural surfaces, such as trees and vines, without needing to make an {@variantrule Ability Check|Ishiir}, when you do your {@variantrule Climb Speed|Ishiir} is equal to your walking {@variantrule Speed|Ishiir}.

entries.name: Languages
entries: Common and Elvish and one language of your choice.

entries.name: Illusionist
entries: You know the {@spell Minor Illusion|Ishiir} cantrip. Your spellcasting ability for it is INT, WIS, or CHA.

entries.name: Forest Camouflage
entries: You have {@variantrule Advantage|Ishiir} on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks to hide in natural terrain.

entries.name: Forest Consultation
entries: You always have the {@spell Speak with Animals|Ishiir} spell prepared. You can cast it without a spell slot once, regaining the ability to do so again when you finish a {@variantrule Short Rest|Ishiir|Short} or a {@variantrule Long Rest|Ishiir}. You can also use any spell slots you have to cast the spell.

entries.name: Crafter
entries: You gain {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir} in one tool of your choice.

entries.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: You have {@variantrule Advantage|Ishiir} on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks to hide in rocky terrain.

entries.name: Tinkerer
entries: You know the {@spell Mending|Ishiir} and {@spell Prestidigitation|Ishiir} cantrips.

In addition, you can spend 10 minutes to create a Tiny clockwork device (AC 5,1 HP), such as a toy, fire starter, or music box. When you create the device, you determine its function by choosing one effect from the {@spell Prestidigitation|Ishiir} cantrip; the device produces that effect whenever you or another creature takes a {@variantrule Bonus Action|Ishiir} to activate it with a touch.

If the chosen effect has options within it, you choose one of those options for the device when you create it. For example, if you choose the spell's ignite-extinguish effect, you determine whether the device ignites or extinguishes fire; the device doesn't do both. You can have three such devices in existence at a time, and each falls apart 8 hours after its creation or when you dismantle it with a touch as a Utilize action.

entries.name: Cantrip
entries: You know the {@spell Light|Ishiir} cantrip.

entries.name: Divine Magic
entries: Select one 1st level spell from the {@filter Cleric or Paladin spell list|spells|level=1|class=cleric (Ishiir);paladin (Ishiir)|source=Ishiir}. You always have this spell prepared and can cast this spell a number of times per {@variantrule Long Rest|Ishiir} equal to half your {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir}, rounded down (minimum of 1) at spell level 1 without expending a spell slot.

When you reach level 3, select one 2nd level spell from the {@filter Cleric or Paladin spell list|spells|level=1|class=cleric (Ishiir);paladin (Ishiir)|source=Ishiir}. You also always have this spell prepared and can cast this spell a number of times per {@variantrule Long Rest|Ishiir} equal to half your {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir}, rounded down (minimum of 1) at spell level 2 without spending a spell slot.

Intelligence, Wisdom or Charisma is your spellcasting modifier for these spells, chosen when you gain this trait. Whenever you gain a level you may exchange these spells for another spell that meet these criteria.

entries.name: Cantrip
entries: You know the {@spell Mage Hand|Ishiir} cantrip.

entries.name: Arcane Magic
entries: Select one 1st level spell from the {@filter Wizard spell list|spells|level=1|class=wizard (Ishiir)|source=Ishiir}. You always have this spell prepared and can cast this spell a number of times per {@variantrule Long Rest|Ishiir} equal to half your {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir}, rounded down (minimum of 1) at spell level 1 without expending a spell slot.

When you reach level 3, select one 2nd level spell from the {@filter Wizard spell list|spells|level=1|class=wizard (Ishiir)|source=Ishiir}. You also always have this spell prepared and can cast this spell a number of times per {@variantrule Long Rest|Ishiir} equal to half your {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir}, rounded down (minimum of 1) at spell level 2 without spending a spell slot.

Intelligence, Wisdom or Charisma is your spellcasting modifier for these spells, chosen when you gain this trait. Whenever you gain a level you may exchange these spells for another spell that meet these criteria.
